# coralogix_dashboards_folder (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "coralogix_dashboards_folder" "example" {
  name     = "example"
}

data "coralogix_dashboards_folder" "example" {
  id       = "ccd6b9c7-223c-4ee6-8a1e-49da7112670d"
}
```
